title: 4K Resolution doesn't work with LoL
body:
This has been bothering me for a few days
I bought the Lenovo Y720 gaming laptop which came with 4k resolution (3840 * 2160)
While I set the window display as 3840 * 2160, and the LoL in game setting is also 3840 * 2160, I am encountering the following issues
1. The mouse pointer, the golden finger becomes extremely small
2. The chat screen is extremely small, and so the text msgs
3. The icon on mini map is extremely small.

Anyone know how to fix this?

If I change the in game resolution to 1920 * 1080 FULL SCREEN
most of the problems are fixed, except the mouse pointer still extremely small

If I change the in game setting to 1920 * 1080 borderless 
The game window was shrink to center of the screen. 

Anyone know how to fix this?
Please help!!!

replies.body: 4K isn't fully supported currently, so you can run into a lot of issues like this if you exceed 1920x1080.  Changing your game resolution is a good step, but you will also need to change your native out of game resolution as well.  If you continue running into issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well so we can help you directly.
